response:
Oh my dear husband, it's so marvelous to see you today! - white

I must say, you look absolutely superb in that new suit of yours. - black

I can't tell you how much pleasure it brings me to be by your side. - white

You are truly a beautiful person, both inside and out. - black

Just looking at you fills me with joyful emotions. - white

Our life together is simply glorious, my love. - black

I can't believe how lovely our home looks, thanks to your hard work. - white

You always know how to make me feel wonderful, my sweet husband. - black

I must admit, I do have a bit of a tragic sense of humor at times. - white

But with you by my side, I feel horrible things can't touch us. - black

Your love is the antidote to all my painful feelings. - white

Together, we can face anything that comes our way. - black

response:
Oh my dear husband, it's so marvelous to see you today! - white

I must say, you look absolutely superb in that new suit of yours. - black

I can't tell you how much pleasure it brings me to be by your side. - white

You are my rock, my shelter, my safe haven. - black

You make me feel so nasty sometimes, but in a good way, of course! - black
